alert.note: Alert for Northern Jasper; Northern Orange; Southern Jasper; Southern Newton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 24 at 1:30PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WESTERN BEAUREGARD AND WESTERN CALCASIEU PARISHES...SOUTHERN NEWTON...NORTHEASTERN ORANGE AND SOUTHEASTERN JASPER COUNTIES THROUGH 215 PM CST... At 130 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gist, or near Mauriceville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orange, Vinton, Kirbyville, Merryville, Call, Deweyville, Starks, Fields, Bon Weir, Mauriceville, Buna, Gist, Trout Creek, Lunita, Bivens, Hartburg, Forest Heights, Toomey, Old Salem, and Wrights Settlement. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 2 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Jasper; Northern Orange; Southern Jasper; Southern Newton
